Marvelous. The draelkar pylons affect the barsicores, too. We don't need giant rampaging creaturesâ€”we have enough trouble with the normal kind.

Kill a few barsicores, if only to deprive Thulsa of whatever fun he gets out of our misery.
Those barsicores are nasty brutes. You handled them like a master hunter. Fine work."
